meanings.definition: The quality or state of being somewhat blue in color.
meanings.sent1: The bluishness of the sky on a clear day is calming.
meanings.sent2: She noticed a bluishness in the painting that gave it a serene feel.
meanings.sent3: The bluishness of the ocean made it look like a giant swimming pool.
meanings.sent4: The bluishness of his eyes was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The bluishness of the flower petals was like a whisper of the sky.

meanings.definition: A slight bluish tint or hue.
meanings.sent1: The bluishness of the fabric made it stand out among the rest.
meanings.sent2: The bluishness of the light gave the room a mysterious atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: She added a touch of bluishness to her painting to make it more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The bluishness of the moonlight cast a magical glow over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The bluishness of the watercolor painting was delicate and beautiful.
